edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.figure

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.figure.Figure

  • public class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    A general figure window to display a collection of java swing and swing based components in any specified arrangement. Intended Operator: User

      • getTitle

        public javax.swing.JLabel getTitle()
        Get the title label of the entire figure. This label is displayed at the top of the figure, or hidden if there is no title. The title is hidden by setting the text to null
        Returns:
        the title label of the figure
